## Description {#details}

A utility class for building TargetMachines for JITs.

Definition at line 34 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h">JITTargetMachineBuilder.h</a>.

## Public Constructors

### JITTargetMachineBuilder() {#ad180fd040a0603fdebcc1b4cb8b002da}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::orc::JITTargetMachineBuilder::JITTargetMachineBuilder (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> TT)</>}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder">JITTargetMachineBuilder</a> based on the given triple.

Note: <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">TargetOptions</a> is default-constructed, then EmulatedTLS is set to true. If EmulatedTLS is not required, these values should be reset before calling createTargetMachine.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h">JITTargetMachineBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-cpp/#l00018">18</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-cpp">JITTargetMachineBuilder.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### createTargetMachine() {#ad851482024748222bc5538345ec2bd12}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; TargetMachine &gt; &gt; llvm::orc::JITTargetMachineBuilder::createTargetMachine ()</>}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a>.

This operation will fail if the requested target is not registered, in which case see <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/targetselect-h">llvm/Support/TargetSelect.h</a>. To JIT IR the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> and the target&#39;s <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a> must both be registered. To JIT assembly (including inline and module level assembly) the target&#39;s AsmParser must also be registered.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h">JITTargetMachineBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-cpp/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-cpp">JITTargetMachineBuilder.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getDefaultDataLayoutForTarget() {#aae1a8efd4b4afe6411908938a204fa0b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; DataLayout &gt; llvm::orc::JITTargetMachineBuilder::getDefaultDataLayoutForTarget ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the default <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> for the target.

Note: This is reasonably expensive, as it creates a temporary <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> instance under the hood. It is only suitable for use during JIT setup.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h">JITTargetMachineBuilder.h</a>.

### setOptions() {#a6a49f02d0a565e36e9814dabec0a500d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>JITTargetMachineBuilder &amp; llvm::orc::JITTargetMachineBuilder::setOptions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">TargetOptions</a> Options)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">TargetOptions</a>.

Note: This operation will overwrite any previously configured options, including EmulatedTLS and UseInitArray which the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder">JITTargetMachineBuilder</a> sets by default. Clients are responsible for re-enabling these overwritten options.

## Public Static Functions

### detectHost() {#aa67d14db111b10a6a09cb70fa5f4e084}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; JITTargetMachineBuilder &gt; llvm::orc::JITTargetMachineBuilder::detectHost ()</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder">JITTargetMachineBuilder</a> for the host system.

Note: <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">TargetOptions</a> is default-constructed, then EmulatedTLS is set to true. If EmulatedTLS is not required, these values should be reset before calling createTargetMachine.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-h">JITTargetMachineBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-cpp/#l00024">24</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder-cpp">JITTargetMachineBuilder.cpp</a>.
